entity.name: Pranjal
entity.description: Pranjal is a final-year CSE student and independent developer from India. He has built open-source tools, VSCode extensions, and AI-driven projects, and is passionate about creating practical software for the community. He maintains and contributes to projects like Resumedogs and sherlock_mcp, focusing on usability and innovation.

projects.name: sherlock_mcp
projects.description: A tool inspired by Sherlock that checks usernames across multiple platforms, helping users find account availability and links efficiently.

channels.description: Send any amount to support the project. The project is being expanded into a robust set of tools for OSINT and hosting, helping users gather and analyze public information.

plans.name: One-time support
plans.description: Support the project with a one-time contribution.
